feed.title: Google Cloud: Anthos clusters on AWS
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Anthos clusters on AWS

entry.content:
Multiple security vulnerabilities have been identified in the OpenSSL library. The most significant finding is CVE-2025-15467, a critical vulnerability that might allow for remote code execution (RCE) or denial of service (DoS) attacks via network-based vectors.

For more details, see the GCP-2026-006 security bulletin.
entry.summary: Critical security flaws have been found in OpenSSL, including a vulnerability that could lead to remote code execution or denial of service. Users are advised to review the security bulletin for details and mitigation steps.
entry.title: Security: OpenSSL Vulnerabilities Disclosed

entry.content:
You can now launch clusters with the following Kubernetes versions. Click on the following links to see the release notes associated with these patches:

  • 1.33.4-gke.900
  • 1.32.8-gke.600
  • 1.31.11-gke.400
entry.summary: New Kubernetes versions are now available for your clusters.
entry.title: Announcement: New Kubernetes versions available

entry.content:
You can now launch clusters with the following Kubernetes versions. Click on the following links to see the release notes associated with these patches:

  • 1.32.4-gke.200
  • 1.31.7-gke.1000
  • 1.30.11-gke.800
entry.summary: New Kubernetes versions are now available for launch, including 1.32.4-gke.200, 1.31.7-gke.1000, and 1.30.11-gke.800. Release notes for each version are provided in the links.
entry.title: Announcement: New Kubernetes versions available

entry.content:
You can now launch clusters with the following Kubernetes versions. Click on the following links to see the release notes associated with these patches:

  • 1.31.6-gke.200
  • 1.30.10-gke.200
  • 1.29.14-gke.200
entry.summary: New versions of Kubernetes are now available for cluster launches, including 1.31.6-gke.200, 1.30.10-gke.200, and 1.29.14-gke.200. For more details on the release notes for these patches, please refer to the provided links.
entry.title: Announcement: New Kubernetes Versions Available
